summary: Add, get, delete, and update data in a Supabase table.

parameters.name: use custom schema
parameters.description: Whether to use a custom database schema.

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: Name of the database schema to use for the table.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Choose between operating on a row or making a custom API call.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the table row.

parameters.name: table name or id
parameters.description: Select the table to perform the operation on.

parameters.name: select type
parameters.description: Choose how to build the select conditions for updating a row.

parameters.name: must match
parameters.description: Select whether all or any select conditions must match for updating a row.

parameters.name: select conditions
parameters.description: Define the conditions to select rows for updating.
